name: CABIN in the snow
description:
After a shower of snow fallen all through the night stopped, the morning comes again.

You are a girl came out with a broom to clean up the snowy road.

Please help our strangers who need rest to reach this place safely along the way.

However,
We cannot be concentrated on our job all the time.

Unlike the girl, you do not need to keep watching this game.

Do falling into thoughts while listening to sounds of winter forest or do other works.

And then come back when this job comes to your mind.

How to control

[z], [x] : brooming floor

Sound from FreeSound.org

Created for Lowerezjam 2016 / Game by 2GOLD
